lines.text: Hm... the Living Memory shows the gun being fired, before Slick caught fire.
I was going to say that maybe the Go Wizard lit Slick on fire, directly, and he ran around spreading it...
...but it doesn't look like that's possible.
So whatever the wizard set on fire with the candle, it was lit <c=#FF00FF>before</c> the gunshot?
I mean, we have to assume the Go Wizard wasn't alive after the bullet fired, right?
